title: `x.py build` failing on x86_64-pc-windows-gnu
body:
when I run `./x.py build` in msys2-mingw64 I get 
```
Building LLVM for x86_64-pc-windows-gnu
running: "cmake" "C:\\Users\\seppe\\devel\\rust\\src/llvm-project/llvm" "-G" "Ninja" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_ASSERTIONS=OFF" "-DLLVM_TARGETS_TO_BUILD=AArch64;ARM;Hexagon;MSP430;Mips;NVPTX;PowerPC;RISCV;Sparc;SystemZ;WebAssembly;X86" "-DLLVM_EXPERIMENTAL_TARGETS_TO_BUILD=AVR" "-DLLVM_INCLUDE_EXAMPLES=OFF" "-DLLVM_INCLUDE_DOCS=OFF" "-DLLVM_INCLUDE_BENCHMARKS=OFF" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_TERMINFO=OFF" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_LIBEDIT=OFF" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_BINDINGS=OFF" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_Z3_SOLVER=OFF" "-DLLVM_PARALLEL_COMPILE_JOBS=16" "-DLLVM_TARGET_ARCH=x86_64" "-DLLVM_DEFAULT_TARGET_TRIPLE=x86_64-pc-windows-gnu" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_ZLIB=ON" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_LIBXML2=OFF" "-DLLVM_VERSION_SUFFIX=-rust-dev" "-DCMAKE_INSTALL_MESSAGE=LAZY" "-DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc.exe" "-DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=g++.exe" "-DCMAKE_ASM_COMPILER=gcc.exe" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -m64" "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=-ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -m64" "-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=C:\\Users\\seppe\\devel\\rust\\build\\x86_64-pc-windows-gnu\\llvm" "-DCMAKE_ASM_FLAGS= -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -m64" "-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release"
...
...
running: "cmake" "--build" "." "--target" "install" "--config" "Release" "--" "-j" "16"
ninja: error: '/c/Users/seppe/devel/rust/.git/modules/src/llvm-project/logs/HEAD', needed by 'include/llvm/Support/VCSRevision.h', missing and no known rule to make it
thread 'main' panicked at '
command did not execute successfully, got: exit code: 1
```
